title: 命令方块刷怪笼设置问题
author: One-time_accoun
txt_content:
give @p minecraft:mob_spawner 1 0 
{SpawnRange:32,MaxNearbyEntities:8,RequiredPlayerRange:32,Delay:0,SpawnCount:8,MinSpawnDelay:128,MaxSpawnDelay:256,
SpawnPotentials:[

{Weight:8,Entity:
{id:"minecraft:Zombie",
ActiveEffects:[{Id:1,Amplifier:2,Duration:9999,ShowParticles:0b}],
HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_sword",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:shield",Count:1}],
ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_leggings",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet"}]
}},
{Weight:1,Entity:
{id:"minecraft:Skeleton",
HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:shield",Count:1}],
ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:chainmail_leggings",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet"}]
}}
]
}复制代码一开始使用的命令工具版本比较低，所以手动修改了一部分，但仍不能正常运行存在什么错误？
游戏版本1.12.2
非必要：如何让攻击性生物刷怪笼在高亮度下刷怪或者达到相同效果？

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 chyx 于 2018-6-24 15:50 编辑 

发现的第一个问题：nbt标签少嵌套了一层（BlockEntityTag）
发现的第二个问题 实体id里有大写字母


先修改 改完不行再找我

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
至于高亮度刷怪 可以考虑刷出只设置了Passengers这一个NBT的药水云
让它驼着本来想生成的怪物。。
这样 药水云瞬间消失 怪物就出来了

不过缺点是对周围怪物的密度上限检测失效了（因为不再是同样id）
